parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns recoil coefficient of a soldier.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''unitRecoilCoefficient''' soldier

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> soldier: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_myRecoil = [[unitRecoilCoefficient]] [[player]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setUnitRecoilCoefficient]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 7, 2013</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:AgentRev01|AgentRev]]<dd class="note">
If the unit doesn't exist / is null, -1 is returned.


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
